027package org.tquadrat.foundation.stream.internal;
028
029import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
031
032import java.util.ArrayList;
033import java.util.List;
034import java.util.Spliterator;
035import java.util.function.BiPredicate;
036import java.util.function.Consumer;
037
038import org.apiguardian.api.API;
039import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
040
041/**
042 *  An implementation of
043 *  {@link Spliterator}
044 *  that aggregates the elements of the stream based on a provided
045 *  {@link BiPredicate Predicate}.
046 *
047 *  @author Dominic Fox
048 *  @modified Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
049 *  @version $Id: AggregatingSpliterator.java 635 2020-02-04 12:08:02Z tquadrat $
050 *  @since 0.0.7
051 *
052 *  @param  <I> The type of the stream elements.
053 *
054 *  @UMLGraph.link
055 */
056@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: AggregatingSpliterator.java 635 2020-02-04 12:08:02Z tquadrat $" )
057@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.7" )
058public class AggregatingSpliterator<I> implements Spliterator<List<I>>
059{
060        /*------------*\
061    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
062        \*------------*/
063    /**
064     *  The predicate.
065     */
066    private final BiPredicate<List<I>,I> m_Condition;
067
068    /**
069     *  The current slide.
070     */
071    private List<I> m_CurrentSlide = new ArrayList<>();
072
073    /**
074     *  The source.
075     */
076    private final Spliterator<I> m_Source;
077
078        /*--------------*\
079    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
080        \*--------------*/
081    /**
082     *  Creates a new {@code AggregatingSpliterator} instance.
083     *
084     *  @param  source  The source.
085     *  @param  predicate   The predicate.
086     */
087    public AggregatingSpliterator( final Spliterator<I> source, final BiPredicate<List<I>,I> predicate )
088    {
089        m_Source = requireNonNullArgument( source, "source" );
090        m_Condition = requireNonNullArgument( predicate, "predicate" );
091    }   //  AggregatingSpliterator()
092
093        /*---------*\
094    ====** Methods **==========================================================
095        \*---------*/
096    /**
097     *  {@inheritDoc}
098     */
099    @Override
100    public final int characteristics()
101    {
102        final var retValue = m_Source.characteristics() & ~SIZED & ~CONCURRENT;
103
104        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
105        return retValue;
106    }   //  characteristics()
107
108    /**
109     *  {@inheritDoc}
110     */
111    @Override
112    public final long estimateSize() { return m_Source.estimateSize(); }
113
114    /**
115     *  Checks whether the current element is on the current slide.
116     *
117     *  @param  currentElement  The current element.
118     *  @return {@code true} if the current element is on the current slide.
119     */
120    private boolean isSameSlide( final I currentElement )
121    {
122        return m_CurrentSlide.isEmpty() || m_Condition.test( m_CurrentSlide, currentElement );
123    }   //  isSameSlide()
124
125    /**
126     *  {@inheritDoc}
127     */
128    @Override
129    public final boolean tryAdvance( final Consumer<? super List<I>> action )
130    {
131        final var retValue = m_Source.tryAdvance( currentElement ->
132        {
133            if( !isSameSlide( currentElement ) )
134            {
135                action.accept( m_CurrentSlide );
136                m_CurrentSlide = new ArrayList<>();
137            }
138            m_CurrentSlide.add( currentElement );
139        });
140
141        if( !retValue && !m_CurrentSlide.isEmpty() )
142        {
143            action.accept( m_CurrentSlide );
144            m_CurrentSlide = new ArrayList<>();
145        }
146
147        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
148        return retValue;
149    }   //  tryAdvance()
150
151    /**
152     *  {@inheritDoc}
153     */
154    @Override
155    public final Spliterator<List<I>> trySplit() { return null; }
156}
157//  class AggregatingSpliterator
158
159/*
160 *  End of File
161 */
